settings.title: CITRAPUR
settings.details:
• Easy-to-use cleaning and disinfecting wipes
  • Kills 99.9% of germs, bacteria and viruses
  • Effective non-toxic alternative that is safe for use in all facilities
  • EPA-registered (34810-36-96548) List N disinfectant

settings.title: FRESCH
settings.details:
• A non-toxic, botanical disinfectant that kills 99.9% of bacteria and viruses
  • Cleans, disinfects and deodorizes
  • EPA-registered (34810-25-96548) List N disinfectant

settings.title: PREVNT
settings.details:
• Continually cleans surfaces and the air for up to 90 days
  • Effective on a wide variety of everyday surfaces
  • Applies a barrier coating on surfaces to prevent the return of Volatile Organic Compounds

settings.title: NSPECT
settings.details:
• Make the invisible, visible
  • Measure the before and after results of the clean with a Luminometer
  • Promote confidence in the cleaning & disinfection
  • Share the data to customize a cleaning program specific to customer objectives

settings.title: KLARIFY
settings.details:
• A powerful streak-free cleaning formula without any harsh chemicals or abrasives
  • Ideal for all modern surfaces, from touch screens to tinted windows (Ammonia-free, will not damage window tint)
  • Cuts through dirt, dust, grease, grime, and other film contaminants

settings.title: FLOR
settings.details:
• Professional floor cleaner formulated to effectively clean a wide variety of floor surfaces
  • Immediate, results and ongoing biological cleaning action that continues working between applications
  • Safe for users and the environment, dye and fragrance free

settings.title: CTA Title
settings.text: Contact us to learn how you can design a program to keep your environment safe.
